name: Mosaic Storage Systems
tag_list: photography, cloud, sync, photographer, ipad, iphone, ios, lightroom, aperture
overview:
Mosaic provides anywhere access to a photographers images though Lightroom or Aperture.

Mosaic optimizes a serious photographerâ€™s workflow by enabling access to their files, data, and tools in exciting ways that saves time, generates new revenue opportunities, and makes photography more fun.

For the 7 million serious photographers, who take several thousand photos per year, the process of organizing, cataloging, storing, editing, and sharing their images is time consuming and frustrating. Mosaic integrates with the tools photographers already use to enhance their workflow including Adobe Lightroom and Apple Aperture. Mosaic liberates their photography workflow from a single computer. This allows professional photographers to be more profitable and all serious photographers to spend more time taking and editing great photos. Photographers can access their images on multiple devices including the iPad, iPhone and other mobile devices.
